name: npc_dota_hero_axe
bio_loc: As a grunt in the Army of Red Mist, Mogul Khan set his sights on the rank of Red Mist General. In battle after battle he proved his worth through gory deed. His rise through the ranks was helped by the fact that he never hesitated to decapitate a superior. Through the seven year Campaign of the Thousand Tarns, he distinguished himself in glorious carnage, his star of fame shining ever brighter, while the number of comrades in arms steadily dwindled. On the night of ultimate victory, Axe declared himself the new Red Mist General, and took on the ultimate title of 'Axe.' But his troops now numbered zero. Of course, many had died in battle, but a significant number had also fallen to Axe's blade. Needless to say, most soldiers now shun his leadership. But this matters not a whit to Axe, who knows that a one-man army is by far the best.
hype_loc: One after another, Axe cuts down his foes. Marching ahead of his team, he locks his enemies in battle then counters their blows with a deadly spin of his weapon. Slamming his culling blade through a weakened enemy, he is always charging onward.
npe_desc_loc: Taunts and forces enemies to attack him

facets.description_loc: Axe gains Strength based on his armor as long as he's away from his allies.
facets.name: axe_one_man_army

facets.description_loc: Berserker's Call gives attacking enemies more attack speed and Axe more armor for the duration.
facets.name: axe_call_out

abilities.name: axe_berserkers_call
abilities.desc_loc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
abilities.lore_loc: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
abilities.shard_loc: Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units.
facets_loc: Berserker's Call gives Axe increased bonus armor and increases the attack speed of the affected units.

abilities.name: axe_battle_hunger
abilities.desc_loc: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.
abilities.lore_loc: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
notes_loc: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.
abilities.shard_loc: Multiple instances of Battle Hunger can stack on a single target.

abilities.name: axe_counter_helix
abilities.desc_loc: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
abilities.lore_loc: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
notes_loc: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.
Illusions' counters don't increase when they attack when you have a Scepter.
abilities.scepter_loc: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe. Counter Helix no longer has a cooldown and its counter advances when Axe attacks.

abilities.name: axe_culling_blade
abilities.desc_loc: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed and armor.
abilities.lore_loc: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
notes_loc: Culling Blade death cannot be prevented with other abilities like Shallow Grave.

abilities.name: axe_coat_of_blood
abilities.desc_loc: Whenever Axe gets a kill, he permanently gains %armor_per_kill% armor. Killing with Culling Blade gives %culling_blade_multiplier%x that amount.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_axe_culling_blade_speed_duration
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_speed_duration}s Culling Blade Kill Buff Bonus Duration

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_axe_8
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_speed_bonus}% Movement Speed per active Battle Hunger

abilities.name: axe_one_man_army
abilities.desc_loc: Axe gains Strength based on his armor as long as he's away from his allies.
notes_loc: %armor_pct_as_strength%%% of Axe's armor is gained as strength as long as there are no allied heroes within %radius% distance from Axe. Lingers for an additional %bonus_linger_duration%s after approaching an ally.
